product_name: Bertucci A-2T High Polish Titanium Watch
long_description: Rugged yet refined, the M.H. Bertucci A-2T High Polish Titanium watch sports rich details and exacting craftsmanship for long-lasting style and performance. A brilliantly polished solid titanium case, band lugs, scratch-resistant mineral glass crystal and screw-down crown and case back offer impressive durability. 5-year battery powers the reliable, Swiss-made jeweled precision movement. Easy-to-read dial features luminous hands. Ergonomic, offset crown facilitates a full range of wrist movements. 2-ply nylon band utilizes all metal hardware and box stitch construction to ensure durability. Watch is water resistant to 100m (330 ft.).
short_description: Rugged yet refined, the M.H. Bertucci A-2T High Polish Titanium watch sports rich details and exacting craftsmanship for long-lasting style and performance.
